content.description:
Atque hic Aeneas (una namque ire videbat

egregium forma iuvenem et fulgentibus armis,

sed frons laeta parum et deiecto lumina vultu)

“Quis, pater, ille virum qui sic comitatur euntem?

Filius, anne aliquis magna de stirpe nepotum?

(5) Qui strepitus circa comitum! Quantum instar in ipso!

Sed nox atra caput tristi circumvolat umbra.”
content.question: In one or two sentences, identify the historical person from the Augustan period referred to in the passage above and describe his fate.

frqParts.text: In one or two sentences, identify the historical person from the Augustan period referred to in the passage above and describe his fate.

unit.text: 4: Teacher's Choice - Latin Poetry and Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 1 and 2
